item.title: Seven questions Liverpool must answer in January
item.description: The January transfer window is open, and top clubs like Liverpool have big and expensive decisions to make.

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Liverpool want Camavinga, Salah to Roma?
item.description: Liverpool are keen on signing Real Madrid midfielder Eduardo Camavinga. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.
